imgCredit: Two Sisters by Cornelis de Vos
name: The Twins
description: The twins seem to have disappeared. They no longer arrive in the courtyard to stir up the ravens, or to steal the light from the candles. Maybe they've travelled elsewhere? Maybe they have rejoined whatever power manifested them? Maybe they were just temporary dreams, in the mind of a still greater creature? A shame, perhaps, but you have other issues to attend to

choices.name: Perhaps it is for the best
